name: unconfirmed-private-transfer-request
description: Represents a BACnet unconfirmed private transfer request, used for proprietary or vendor-specific services without requiring acknowledgment.

fields.name: vendor-id
fields.description: The vendor identifier for the proprietary service.

fields.name: service-number
fields.description: The service number identifying the proprietary service.

fields.name: service-parameters
fields.description: Optional parameters for the proprietary service.
